nodes.text: Deva Lompop was a Shani female bounty hunter and mercenary who operated from the time of the High Republic into the Imperial Era. Lompop carried a variety of different weapons, including knives and blasters, and wore plated armor. By the time of the Imperial Era, Lompop had moved onto other work, but the bounty hunter was specifically requested by Jabba the Hutt, joining the hunt for the carbonite-frozen smuggler Han Solo, though she secretly wanted to kill Jabba. Eventually she learned the location of Solo and informed Crimson Dawn of his location, for which she was paid.

Deva Lompop was created by writer Justina Ireland and artist Iban Coello for the Star Wars: War of the Bounty Hunters comic crossover event, and debuted in War of the Bounty Hunters – Jabba the Hutt 1 and is set to appear in the following one-shots. In an article published on StarWars.com on June 24, 2021 that revealed the character, Ireland hinted that Lompop would feature in upcoming works in Star Wars: The High Republic.
